title: The Blood Slave
description: This story is about battling your inner demons and giving into your deepest desires, even when it's against society's normalcies.Devon is a Navy SEAL and Jake is a tatted up vampire; neither cannot resist each other's charms no matter how hard they try.They are complete opposite and to make things even more dire, Devon thought he was straight. However, the chemistry that sizzles between them is nothing less than explosive and neither one can deny what they are feeling.*** *** *** *** ***Devon just got back from his tour in Romania as a Navy SEAL Team Six member. He has a major problem though. After being with only his battle buddies for two years straight with no female contact, he is having problems getting relief. Problems that start in his mind, because he finds himself sexually attracted to men now...Jake is addicted to tattoos because they are a great outlet for his pent up stress of being the only vampire in North Carolina. He is looking for a blood slave but is having no luck because his one major request is that his blood slave is not only a compatible blood type but...that he is also a man...They are both invited to a Halloween party at the new club, The Castle, and from the moment they first set eyes on each other things start heating up!
author: Serenity Cole
